resources.string: Use volume up/down buttons to change system volume.
To ensure reliable operation please disable all power saving modes.
When phone enters low power mode some notifications may be skipped.
Allow to work in low power (Doze/Idle) mode. May not always work for notifications more frequent than 15 minutes. Setting may slightly affect battery usage.

Recently BlipBlip was unexpectedly stopped. Please make sure you are not using any battery optimization (or power saving, eco, etc.) mode or app (e.g. task killers). They usually cause such issues. If you need to use such app, please add BlipBlip to whitelist in that app. If you think this is bug in the app or need help, please describe your problem using \"Report problem\" option or write on BlipBlip Google+ community.

Recently BlipBlip was unexpectedly stopped. Please make sure you are not using any battery optimization (or power saving, eco, etc.) mode or app (e.g. task killers). They usually cause such issues. If you need to use such app, please add BlipBlip to whitelist in that app. If you think this is bug in the app or need help, please describe your problem using \"%1$s\" option.
Allow playing sound in Silent mode
Light up screen in Silent mode even if \"Light up screen on notification\" option is disabled
BlipBlip notification sound disabled, because your device is in silent mode.
Allow playing sound in Vibrate mode
Force vibration in Vibrate mode even if vibration is disabled
Light up screen in Vibrate mode even if \"Light up screen on notification\" option is disabled
BlipBlip notification sound disabled, because your device is in vibrate mode.
Notification disabled, because today is \"silent day\".
Please change \"Silent days\" setting to make BlipBlip work today.
Disabling this option may cause app to not behave correctly due to bug in android 5.0.1 (especially on Samsung devices). If you experience any problems, please try re-enabling this option.
BlipBlip notifications are now disabled, because you are listening to music.
BlipBlip notifications are now disabled, because you are in a phone call.
Display notification regardless if it is enabled
Display notification only if it is enabled
Dismiss notification automatically after some time.
Notification will not be dismissed automatically.
If vibration is enabled vibrate also on connected Android Wear device
Do not vibrate on Android Wear device
If vibration is enabled vibrate also on connected wearable device (e.g. smart watch)
If vibration is enabled vibrate also on connected wearable device (e.g. smart watch). Requires adding system notification.
Do not vibrate on connected wearable device
May not vibrate on main device when notification priority is set to \"Minimum\". Should vibrate otherwise.
Play the notification (sound, vibration, etc.) same as from the app.
Button for disabling or enabling notifications.
Snooze ringing alarm or upcoming notification.
Changing these settings may impact reliability of the app.
Notifications act as alarms – fixes 3–5 minute notification delays on some Samsung devices

It has been detected that notification was delayed by several minutes which happens on some Samsung devices. To prevent this, an \"Alarm mode\" option has been enabled, which should fix this issue. You can disable this option and automatic enabling of this option in the Advanced Settings. If there will be better solution found to fix the issue the app will be updated. If you have any more problems please report them via email.
Alarm mode enabled to fix delay issue
Enable Alarm mode if notification delay detected
Do not enable Alarm mode automatically
Fixes low volume on some Motorola devices with rising volume feature. May delay sound playback by few seconds.
Disabled. Not needed for most devices.
Displays non-dismissible notification and enables background service which might prevent killing of the app.
Keep background service always started in the background (may use more memory). If notification is persistent service becomes foreground.
Start background service only when needed (may use less memory).
If you disable it you can enable it later in the settings.
Save logs for Report problem email
These are experimental settings and may be removed in the future.
Offset from target time in seconds
Number of seconds random time may differ from exact time
Use regular email attachments in \"Report problem\" email.
Check out BlipBlip hourly chime app!
Check out BlipBlip hourly chime android app
Thank you for taking time to review the app.
Rate us 5 stars to help make Blip\u00A0Blip even more awesome. Thanks!
Please describe your problem with the app (preferably in English):
Please tell us what we can improve to make you satisfied with the app.
Current volume is set to zero.
%s requires to be enabled in "Protected Apps" to function properly.
Try restarting app if device is low on memory. This will not work on all devices. It is not needed on most devices (may use a little bit more battery).
Do not try restarting app if device is low on memory.
Tries to actively prevent notification delays which happen on some devices. May use more battery.
Does not try to prevent notification delays which may occur on some devices. Uses less battery.
Notifications should be more often accurate. May use more battery.
Notifications may be late in rare cases. Uses less battery.
If notification is considered delayed it won\'t be shown or played.
Notifications will be shown or played even when they are delayed.
While app plays sound, audio from other apps will be quieter or paused.
Audio from other apps will be played normally.
While app is playing sound other apps may pause their audio.
While app is playing sound other apps may lower volume of their audio.
Resets internal parameters which improve notification accuracy.
Foreground service setting has been disabled. This may increase chance that background process is killed and app stops working.
BlipBlip notifications are now disabled, because you are in airplane mode.
Allows switching themes using volume buttons.
Use color background for next notification bar.
Use gray background for next notification bar.
Would you like to restore default values?

BlipBlip does not have permission to read the file.\nDo you want to install add-on which has this permission?\nYou can also use some other app which supports transferring files without need for additional permission (e.g. Google Drive).
BlipBlip does not have permission to read the file.\nPlease use some other app that shares file without need for additional permission (e.g. Google Drive).
BlipBlip Add-on plugin requires update. Would you like to update it now?
Show menus with actions that would otherwise require gestures (e.g. swiping). Useful when using TalkBack.
Hide menus with actions that can also be performed using gestures.
Choosing seconds is enabled. Displays times with seconds.
Choosing seconds is disabled. Display times without seconds.
BlipBlip notifications are now disabled, because you have headset connected.
No email application found to send the report.
Task killers should be disabled or BlipBlip should be added in their white lists to keep app alive.

Foreground service option informs OS that application should not be killed if possible.\n
It will display persistent notification which can be hidden from system settings (hiding it from the app will disable this option).\n
You can use button below to access system settings
Sound is in use and cannot be deleted.
Vibration is in use and cannot be deleted.
Cannot perform this operation right now. Please try again later.
Allow the app to work in this mode
Application is disabled in this mode
Sounds are allowed in this mode
Vibrations not allowed in this mode
Screen is allowed to be enabled in this mode
Screen will not be enabled in this mode
These options may not work on all devices.
Sound is disabled because following mode is active: %1$s
Vibration is disabled because following mode is active: %1$s
Opens system Accessibility settings where you can enable app as accessibility service

This service helps to keep the app working. It does not access any data or modify any content. It is just protection against memory managers which may kill the app. If you are not experiencing problems with the app you don\'t need to activate it.
Helps keep app alive. Does not access any data.
When specifying time range show buttons which allow to specify whether given time should be included in time range.
Hide buttons allowing to choose if time should be included in time range.
Open system settings to hide notification. This is recommended way for hiding notification because it allows the app to work in foreground.
Text to speech engine is not yet initialized
Open system text to speech settings
Speaking will not overlap sounds (sound will play before or after speaking)
Do Not Disturb, vibrate mode, etc.
Get all current and future features.
Press \"Unlock\" to start your free trial.
Action you tried to performed uses following premium features:
Get all sounds in the app
Get all current features and sounds
This is premium sound which requires unlocking before use.
This is premium feature which requires unlocking before use.
Add new sound from external app
